Convex Analysis (Rockafellar, 1970) -- Chapter 02 -- Section 09 -- Part 6

Finite-case contradiction in the non- : ?m.1 branch of recessionCone_sum_epigraph_prod {n m : } {f f0_plus : Fin m (Fin n ) EReal} (hnotbot : (i : Fin m) (x : Fin n ), f i x ) (hnotbot0 : (i : Fin m) (x : Fin n ), f0_plus i x ) (hconv_i : (i : Fin m), Convex (epigraph Set.univ (f i))) (hrec_i : (i : Fin m), (epigraph Set.univ (f i)).recessionCone = epigraph Set.univ (f0_plus i)) : have g := fun x => i, f i (x i); have g0_plus := fun x => i, f0_plus i (x i); {p | g p.1 p.2}.recessionCone = {p | g0_plus p.1 p.2}recessionCone_sum_epigraph_prod.

lemma recessionCone_sum_epigraph_prod_finite_contra {n m : Nat} {f f0_plus : Fin m (Fin n Real) EReal} {g : (Fin m (Fin n Real)) EReal} (hg : g = fun x => Finset.univ.sum (fun i => f i (x i))) (hnotbot : i : Fin m, x, f i x ( : EReal)) (_hnotbot0 : i : Fin m, x, f0_plus i x ( : EReal)) (_hrec_i : i : Fin m, Set.recessionCone (epigraph (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real)) (f i)) = epigraph (Set.univ : Set (Fin n Real)) (f0_plus i)) {p : (Fin m (Fin n Real)) Real} {i0 : Fin m} {a : Fin m Real} {x0 : Fin n Real} {0 t : Real} (hgt0 : f i0 (x0 + t p.1 i0) > ((0 + t * a i0 : Real) : EReal)) (_hx0 : f i0 x0 (0 : EReal)) (ha_sum : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => a i) = p.2) {x : Fin m (Fin n Real)} { : Fin m Real} (hxi0 : x i0 = x0) (hi0 : i0 = 0) (_hxle : i, f i (x i) ( i : EReal)) { : Fin m Real} (hslack : i i0, (( i + t * a i - i : Real) : EReal) f i (x i + t p.1 i)) (h : (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => i) < (f i0 (x0 + t p.1 i0)).toReal - (0 + t * a i0)) (hmem''' : g (x + t p.1) (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) + t * p.2 : EReal)) (htopg : i, f i (x i + t p.1 i) = ( : EReal)) : False := by classical let : Fin m EReal := fun i => f i (x i + t p.1 i) let b : Fin m Real := fun i => i + t * a i have hnot_top : i, i ( : EReal) := by intro i htopi exact htopg i, by simpa [] using htopi have hnot_bot : i, i ( : EReal) := by intro i exact hnotbot i (x i + t p.1 i) have hgt : i0 > (b i0 : EReal) := by simpa [, b, hxi0, hi0] using hgt0 have hslack' : i i0, i ((b i - i : Real) : EReal) := by intro i hi have h := hslack i hi simpa [, b, sub_eq_add_neg, add_comm, add_left_comm, add_assoc] using h have h' : (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => i) < ( i0).toReal - b i0 := by simpa [, b, hxi0, hi0] using h have hsum_gt : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) > (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) : EReal) := ereal_strict_sum_from_one_component_with_slack ( := ) (b := b) ( := ) (i0 := i0) hnot_top hnot_bot hgt hslack' h' have hsum_le : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) : EReal) := by have hmem'''_sum := hmem''' simp [hg] at hmem'''_sum have hsum_b : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) + t * p.2 := by calc Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i + t * a i) := by rfl _ = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) + Finset.univ.sum (fun i => t * a i) := by simp [Finset.sum_add_distrib] _ = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) + t * Finset.univ.sum (fun i => a i) := by simp [Finset.mul_sum] _ = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) + t * p.2 := by simp [ha_sum] have hsum_b_ereal : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => (b i : EReal)) = (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) : EReal) + (t : EReal) * (p.2 : EReal) := by have hsum_b' : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => (b i : EReal)) = ((Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) + t * p.2) : EReal) := by have hsum_b'' := congrArg (fun x : Real => (x : EReal)) hsum_b simpa [sum_coe_ereal] using hsum_b'' simpa [EReal.coe_add, EReal.coe_mul, sum_coe_ereal] using hsum_b' rw [ sum_coe_ereal (s := Finset.univ) (f := fun i => i)] at hmem'''_sum rw [ hsum_b_ereal] at hmem'''_sum simpa [] using hmem'''_sum exact (not_lt_of_ge hsum_le) hsum_gt

A strict inequality at one component gives a strict inequality for the total sum.

lemma sum_lt_sum_of_one_lt {m : Nat} {a b : Fin m Real} {i0 : Fin m} (hlt : a i0 < b i0) (hEq : i i0, a i = b i) : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => a i) < Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) := by classical have hsum_a : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => a i) = a i0 + (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => a i) := by symm exact (Finset.add_sum_erase (s := Finset.univ) (f := fun i => a i) (a := i0) (by simp)) have hsum_b : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) = b i0 + (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => b i) := by symm exact (Finset.add_sum_erase (s := Finset.univ) (f := fun i => b i) (a := i0) (by simp)) have hsum_rest : (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => a i) = (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => b i) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro i hi have hne : i i0 := (Finset.mem_erase.mp hi).1 simp [hEq i hne] calc Finset.univ.sum (fun i => a i) = a i0 + (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => a i) := hsum_a _ = a i0 + (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => b i) := by simp [hsum_rest] _ < b i0 + (Finset.univ.erase i0).sum (fun i => b i) := by exact add_lt_add_of_lt_of_le hlt (le_rfl) _ = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) := by exact hsum_b.symm

A strict inequality at one component of a finite EReal : TypeEReal sum gives a strict inequality for the total sum (when the other components agree with the real bounds).

lemma ereal_sum_lt_sum_of_one_lt {m : Nat} { : Fin m EReal} {b : Fin m Real} {i0 : Fin m} (hbot : i, i ( : EReal)) (htop : i, i ( : EReal)) (hlt : (b i0 : EReal) < i0) (hEq : i i0, i = (b i : EReal)) : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) > (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) : EReal) := by classical let rb : Fin m Real := fun i => ( i).toReal have h_eq : i, i = (rb i : EReal) := by intro i simpa [rb] using (EReal.coe_toReal (htop i) (hbot i)).symm have hEq' : i i0, b i = rb i := by intro i hi have hb : (b i : EReal) = (rb i : EReal) := by calc (b i : EReal) = i := by symm exact hEq i hi _ = (rb i : EReal) := h_eq i have hb' := congrArg EReal.toReal hb simpa using hb' have hlt_real : b i0 < rb i0 := by have hlt' : (b i0 : EReal) < (rb i0 : EReal) := by simpa [h_eq i0] using hlt exact (EReal.coe_lt_coe_iff).1 hlt' have hsum_lt : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) < Finset.univ.sum (fun i => rb i) := sum_lt_sum_of_one_lt (i0 := i0) hlt_real hEq' have hsum_lt' : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => (b i : EReal)) < Finset.univ.sum (fun i => (rb i : EReal)) := by simpa [sum_coe_ereal] using (EReal.coe_lt_coe_iff).2 hsum_lt have hsum_eq : Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => (rb i : EReal)) := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro i hi simp [h_eq i] have hsum_b : (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) : EReal) = Finset.univ.sum (fun i => (b i : EReal)) := by simp [sum_coe_ereal] have hsum_lt'' : (Finset.univ.sum (fun i => b i) : EReal) < Finset.univ.sum (fun i => i) := by simpa [hsum_eq, hsum_b] using hsum_lt' simpa [gt_iff_lt] using hsum_lt''

Componentwise recession directions give a recession direction for the summed epigraph.
